subject: Re: [junit] Testing J2EEDelegate
msgSnippet: Hi, Now, the graphical test runner is working fine with my tests. I added org.apache.*  to excluded.properties(this file is packaged in ... The Junit FAQ has
messageBody:
Hi,

Now, the graphical test runner is working fine with my tests.
I added "org.apache.*" to excluded.properties(this file is packaged in
|junit.jar| as |junit/runner/excluded.properties|).
The Junit FAQ has some information about this situation.

[]'s
Fernando

J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

>Axis appears not to want to be initialized twice in the same JVM. In my opinion, Axis has a bug. They likely would not agree with that assessment.
>
>You may need to change your tests (or production code!) so that Axis is not initialized more than once while the application is running.
>
>Good luck.
>
>
